description: • Designed a responsive web application, with a HeadlessCMS approach, using GatsbyJS, ReactJS, ContentfulCMS, GraphQL and Snipcart as a payment gateway, for an online CoffeeSHop, to sell beverages online

• Designed a responsive React Application with a Responsive UI to Track and Display Covid19 Cases, Globally and Country Specific in Numeric and Graphical format, with React Material UI components and Chart.js Charts

• Designed a responsive web application using React JS, to retrieve and display Crypto Currency/Coin prices using the CryptoComapre API, along with the price historyDesigned a responsive application using React JSto view Desired Crypto Currency/Coin prices, along with the price history statistics, in Days/Weeks/Months and change in Days/Weeks/Months

• Designed an IOT circuit, with sensors attached to individual Arduino circuits to read and report Soil pH(fertility), moisture & temperature values, to a Raspberry Pi 3, acting as a HUB. The Raspberry Pi will then upload all the data into the cloud
